page.shortlink: form layout ink properties ink bounds width property
page.description: Specify the width in 'ink units' ('ink unit' - assume an 8.5 inch wide page with 300 'ink dots per unit' - the width of the page would be 8.5 * 300 'ink units'.) This property is only available if the *[ui:Ink bounds type]* is set to 'Explicit'.
